text: Bibeltemplet the (Bible temple) is a Christian website in Sweden. Its administrator Leif Liljestr√∂m was sentenced to prison for two months in April 2005 for expressing critical views on homosexuality.International Religious Freedom Report 2006 The case was appealed twice, and in November 2007 the Supreme Court of Sweden acquitted him.The Local: "Christian web editor cleared of hate speech" == References == ==Other websites== *Bibeltemplet website Category:Christianity in Sweden
